Sudanese army says its forces have withdrawn from Wad Madani city - statementThe Sudanese army said in a statement on Tuesday that its forces have withdrawn from positions in Wad Madani city, adding that it will investigate the reasons for the withdrawal. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 16:13:47 GMT MJVKLO3PYJPAHLD7RCDPUVVSSI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/sudanese-army-says-its-forces-have-withdrawn-wad-madani-city-statement-2023-12-19/Reuters世界非洲
Boeing plane departs from closed Kyiv airport on technical flightUkraine's Boryspil International Airport, which is closed due to war, saw the departure of a Boeing 777-300 operated by local airline Skyline Express on a technical flight on Tuesday, it said on its Facebook page. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 15:44:06 GMT UDPWAG557VIIRLA7PD3SICGLHU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/boeing-plane-departs-close-kyiv-airport-technical-flight-2023-12-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Mexico to challenge Texas' new 'inhumane' migration law, president saysMexican President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador on Tuesday said his government was preparing to challenge a new Texas law allowing state law enforcement to arrest suspected migrants, which he called "inhumane." Tue, 19 Dec 2023 15:26:17 GMT NB6KI3AG7NI5JCJKT6G5HVIHFE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexico-challenge-texas-new-in humane-migration-law-president-says-2023-12-19/Reuters世界美洲
Azerbaijan says border issues shouldn't get in way of peace deal with ArmeniaAzerbaijan sees no major obstacles to securing a lasting peace treaty with its neighbour Armenia and believes the question of defining their borders can be resolved separately, a senior Azerbaijani official said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 15:10:47 GMT R7EJMKAKOVIV3GA5DUKCCPMAWY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/azerbaijan-says-border-issues-shouldnt-get-way-peace-deal-with-armenia-2023-12-19/Alexander Marrow世界欧洲
Amid rockets from Gaza, Google apps suspend Israel traffic-jam displaysUsers of Google navigation apps in Israel are not seeing traffic jams due a precautionary suspension of that function as the country comes under rocket salvoes from Gaza and Lebanon. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 15:03:41 GMT O4BYUJDZRJKWFEB5SPXF4GD2E4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/amid-rockets-gaza-google-apps-suspend-israel-traffic-jam-displays-2023-12-19/Reuters世界中东
Gaza war is world's 'moral failure', Red Cross chief saysThe head of the International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC) on Tuesday deplored the conflict in Gaza as a "moral failure" of the international community and urged Israel and Hamas to reach a new deal to halt the fighting. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 14:53:11 GMT JMJX4YGP7FPVZCEVXAIELMAYVY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-war-is-worlds-moral-failure-red-cross-chief-says-2023-12-19/Emma Farge世界中东
Foreign correspondents petition Israel Supreme Court for Gaza accessThe Foreign Press Association in Jerusalem filed a petition on Tuesday with the Israeli Supreme Court requesting immediate access for international media to the Gaza Strip. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 14:49:33 GMT SNUC2KGYTFN5NGKRBYJWOUJZSA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/foreign-correspondents-petition-israel-supreme-court-gaza-access-2023-12-19/Reuters世界中东
Pope: Israelis, Palestinians face Christmas 'of pain and mourning'Israelis and Palestinians face "pain and mourning" over the Christmas period as the war in the Gaza Strip rages on, Pope Francis said on Tuesday, calling for prayers and "tangible aid" for the devastated enclave. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 14:37:44 GMT GP3UMDU5XVJ6XKEDX3ECQWKZUQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/pope-israelis-palestinians-face-christmas-of-pain-mourning-2023-12-19/Reuters世界中东
Germany's AfD hits record high in poll after budget chaosSupport for Germany's far-right Alternative for Germany (AfD) hit an all-time high of 23% in a poll on Tuesday as the party continued to benefit from the fallout of a budget crisis. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 14:24:26 GMT CEIUVPXFXZNFPPPDF7WRWOUMGU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/germanys-afd-hits-record-high-poll-after-budget-chaos-2023-12-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Israel's Herzog floats second Gaza truce for recovering hostagesIsraeli President Isaac Herzog signalled readiness on the part of the country on Tuesday to enter another foreign-mediated Gaza truce in order to recover hostages held by Hamas and enable more aid to reach the besieged Palestinian enclave. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 14:19:48 GMT CFEVMJDGXRKC7A45773PMLXUVM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israels-herzog-floats-second-gaza-truce-recovering-hostages-2023-12-19/Reuters世界中东
Russian former soldier wants to testify to ICC over war crimes witnessedA former Russian soldier has sought asylum in the Netherlands and wants to testify at the International Criminal Court about war crimes by Russia that he witnessed while fighting in Ukraine, a Dutch legal source told Reuters on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 13:07:47 GMT HWR4VMNEDRL7JD6CDSRSNHNFEQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-former-soldier-wants-testify-icc-over-war-crimes-witnessed-2023-12-19/Stephanie Van Den Berg世界欧洲
